lead_paragraph: The Italians, disparaged by their country’s news media entering the tournament, earned a 2-0 victory over the world’s No. 2-ranked team.

headline.print_headline: Italy Defies Expectations to Beat Talented Belgium
headline.main: Italy Defies Expectations to Beat Belgium in European Championships

snippet: The Italians, disparaged by their country’s news media entering the tournament, earned a 2-0 victory over the world’s No. 2-ranked team.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Italy defeats Belgium, 2-0, in group stage of European Championships; other soccer news noted.
